bossbar.lavasurvival.grace_period: The flood is coming in %s seconds... start preparing!
bossbar.lavasurvival.title: Don't get burned! %s seconds left
death.lavasurvival.lava: %s lost their life to the lava.
death.lavasurvival.other: %s didn't even die to the lava...
game.lavasurvival.desc: The classic Minecraft gamemode brought to Modern Minecraft. Survive the infinite flood of Lava!
game.lavasurvival.armageddon.desc: The Lava... it's coming from everywhere!
game.lavasurvival.long.desc: It's kind of like an ant farm.
game.lavasurvival.normal.desc: The most normal of the bunch...
game.lavasurvival.the_nether_long.desc: The Nether, but long! Could've guessed that.
gui.blockmenu.title: Select block
message.lavasurvival.spectate: Hey! You're a spectator because you joined a game in progress! Try and catch the next one!
message.lavasurvival.lose: Seems like the lava won this one...
